commercial_proposal.proposal_html:
💼 Commercial Proposal

Fitness Tracking App

Project Fitness Tracking App
Version 1.0
Generated by AICOE Platform
Date October 30, 2025

Commercial Proposal: Fitness Tracking App

Executive Summary

AICOE proposes a partnership to develop the "Fitness Tracking App," a mobile-first solution designed to capture the beginner fitness market. Our approach leverages a unique AI-powered photo nutrition logging feature and a simplified, encouraging user experience to differentiate from data-heavy competitors. This proposal outlines a comprehensive plan to deliver a robust Minimum Viable Product (MVP) within 6 months for a total investment of $183,500. By choosing AICOE, you are not just hiring developers; you are engaging a strategic partner dedicated to building a scalable, intelligent platform poised to achieve your business goals of 100,000 registered users and a 5% premium conversion rate in the first year.

Key Benefits & Value Proposition: * Market Differentiation: A unique AI photo-logging feature that disrupts the manual entry model dominated by competitors like MyFitnessPal. * Beginner-Focused Design: An intuitive, non-intimidating interface that directly addresses the needs of the target user, driving higher engagement and retention. * Data-Driven Monetization: A freemium model built on a solid technical foundation, designed for seamless conversion to a premium tier. * Expert Execution: A dedicated, cross-functional team from AICOE with proven expertise in delivering scalable mobile applications.

Total Investment & Timeline Summary: * Total Project Investment: $183,500 (excluding post-launch support) * Estimated Go-Live Date: 26 weeks from project kickoff

1. Solution Overview

Problem Statement

The current fitness app market presents a paradox for beginners. While options are plentiful, they are often overly complex, data-intensive, and intimidating, creating a significant barrier to entry for individuals new to health and wellness. Furthermore, nutrition tracking, a cornerstone of fitness, remains a tedious manual process, leading to low adherence and user fatigue. There is a clear market gap for a solution that simplifies fitness tracking and provides encouraging, structured guidance.

Proposed Solution

AICOE will build the "Fitness Tracking App," a sophisticated yet simple mobile application that empowers fitness beginners. The app's core philosophy is "Simplicity through Intelligence." We will achieve this by combining structured, pre-made workout plans with a groundbreaking AI-powered photo-based nutrition logging feature. This low-friction approach removes the guesswork and intimidation, making health and wellness accessible to everyone. The platform will be built on a freemium model, designed to drive user acquisition and conversion through clear, demonstrable value.

Key Features and Capabilities

Our solution is directly mapped to the core use cases required for MVP success:

  • Guided Workout Tracking (UC-001): An intuitive interface for logging exercises with sets, reps, and weight. Includes visual demonstrations and an integrated rest timer to ensure proper form and pacing.
  • Structured Workout Plans (UC-002): A library of curated, beginner-friendly workout plans (e.g., "30-Day Full Body Challenge") that provide immediate structure and guidance. Plans will be clearly gated as Free or Premium.
  • AI-Powered Nutrition Logging (UC-003): Our key differentiator. Users can snap a photo of their meal, and our integrated AI service will identify food items and estimate nutritional information (calories, protein, carbs, fat), drastically simplifying the tracking process.
  • Motivational Progress Visualization (UC-004): A dashboard displaying key metrics, progress charts, and gamified achievements (badges, streaks) to keep users motivated and engaged. Includes privacy-safe sharing capabilities.
  • Seamless Premium Subscription (UC-005): A frictionless in-app purchase flow for upgrading to Premium, unlocking advanced plans, personalized analytics, and exclusive content.

Technology Stack

AICOE will utilize a modern, scalable, and cost-effective technology stack to ensure robust performance and future-proofing:

  • Mobile Application: React Native for cross-platform development (iOS & Android), reducing time-to-market and ensuring a consistent user experience.
  • Backend Services: Node.js with Express.js for a scalable and efficient API layer.
  • Database: PostgreSQL for reliable relational data storage of user profiles, workouts, and nutrition logs.
  • Cloud Infrastructure: Amazon Web Services (AWS) for hosting, database management (RDS), and object storage (S3 for photos).
  • AI Service: Google Cloud Vision API for industry-leading image analysis in nutrition logging.
  • CI/CD & DevOps: GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment, ensuring rapid and reliable releases.

2. Scope of Work

Deliverables Breakdown

  1. iOS Mobile Application: Fully native-feeling app compatible with the latest iOS versions, submitted and approved for the Apple App Store.
  2. Android Mobile Application: Fully native-feeling app compatible with the latest Android versions, submitted and approved for the Google Play Store.
  3. Backend API & Database: A secure, documented, and scalable RESTful API powering the mobile applications.
  4. Admin Web Panel: A simple web-based interface for managing workout plans, user support, and reviewing content requests.
  5. Project Documentation: Includes technical architecture documentation, API documentation, and a deployment guide.

Included Services

  • Dedicated Project Management
  • UI/UX Design (wireframing, mockups, prototype)
  • Full-Cycle Mobile & Backend Development
  • Third-Party API Integration (Google Vision, In-App Purchases)
  • Comprehensive Quality Assurance & Testing
  • Deployment to App Stores
  • Knowledge transfer and handover session.

Exclusions (Out of Scope)

  • Ongoing content creation for new workout plans or nutrition articles post-launch.
  • Marketing, user acquisition campaigns, and App Store Optimization (ASO) services.
  • Legal and compliance costs (e.g., privacy policy generation).
  • Long-term server hosting costs beyond the initial 3-month period covered in the proposal.
  • Post-launch support and maintenance (covered under a separate agreement).

3. Project Timeline

We propose a structured 26-week (6-month) timeline divided into four distinct phases to ensure clarity, manage risk, and deliver on schedule.

Phase Duration Key Activities & Milestones
Phase 1: Discovery & Design 4 Weeks - Project kickoff & requirements finalization
- UI/UX wireframing and mockups
- Technical architecture design
- Milestone: Finalized UI/UX Design & Technical Spec
Phase 2: Core MVP Development 16 Weeks - Backend API & database setup
- User authentication & profile management
- Workout logging & plan features (UC-001, UC-002)
- AI nutrition logging integration (UC-003)
- Progress visualization (UC-004)
- Milestone: Feature-Complete MVP Ready for Internal Testing
Phase 3: Integration & QA 4 Weeks - Premium subscription & IAP integration (UC-005)
- End-to-end testing on real devices
- Performance and security testing
- Bug fixing and stabilization
- Milestone: Stable, Tested Beta Version
Phase 4: Deployment & Launch 2 Weeks - App Store submission (iOS & Android)
- Launch preparation & marketing support sync
- Milestone: App Live on App Stores (Go-Live)

Go-Live Date Estimate: 26 weeks from project kickoff.

4. Pricing Structure

Investment Breakdown

Category Description Cost
Development Costs Covers all design, project management, and development for mobile apps, backend, and admin panel. $168,000
Infrastructure Costs Covers initial setup for AWS (EC2, RDS, S3) for the first 3 months post-launch. $10,000
Licensing & Third-Party Services Covers initial usage and integration costs for Google Cloud Vision API and other development tools. $5,500
Subtotal $183,500

Payment Terms

We offer a flexible, milestone-based payment structure to align with project progress and mitigate risk.

  • Payment Schedule:

    • 30% ($55,050): Due upon contract signing to commence Phase 1.
    • 40% ($73,400): Due upon completion of Phase 2 and the "Feature-Complete MVP" milestone.
    • 30% ($55,050): Due upon successful app store launch and project completion (Phase 4).

  • Accepted Payment Methods: Bank Transfer, ACH.

5. Team Composition

AICOE will assign a dedicated, cross-functional team of experts to your project.

Role Responsibilities Expertise
Project Manager Primary point of contact, manages timeline, budget, and resources. 8+ years in agile software project management for mobile apps.
Tech Lead / Backend Dev Oversees technical architecture, leads backend development. 10+ years in Node.js, cloud architecture (AWS), and API design.
Mobile Developer (x2) Develops the React Native application for iOS and Android. 7+ years average experience in React Native and native integrations.
QA Engineer Develops and executes test plans, ensures product quality. 5+ years in manual and automated testing for mobile applications.
UI/UX Designer Creates all user interfaces, wireframes, and interactive prototypes. 6+ years designing user-centric mobile apps, with a portfolio in health & wellness.

6. Quality Assurance

Our commitment to quality is embedded in our development process.

  • Testing Methodology: We employ a hybrid testing approach, including unit tests, integration tests, and comprehensive end-to-end user scenario testing based on the provided use cases.
  • Code Review Process: All code undergoes mandatory peer review via pull requests to ensure quality, maintainability, and adherence to best practices before merging.
  • Performance Benchmarks: We will target specific performance KPIs, including app startup time (<3s), API response time (<200ms), and low memory usage.
  • Security Measures: We will follow OWASP best practices for web security, implement data encryption (both in-transit and at-rest), and ensure secure user authentication to protect all user data.

7. Risk Management

Proactive risk identification and mitigation are key to project success.

Identified Risk Likelihood Impact Mitigation Strategy
AI API Accuracy Medium High Implement a robust "manual log" fallback flow. Conduct extensive testing with diverse food images.
App Store Rejection Low High Adhere strictly to Apple and Google's guidelines. Initiate a pre-review process. Allocate buffer time in the timeline.
Scope Creep Medium Medium A clearly defined Scope of Work (SOW). Any new features will be handled via a formal Change Request process.
Third-Party Dependency Low Medium Monitor API status and costs. Develop an abstraction layer to allow for switching AI providers if necessary.

8. Support & Maintenance

To ensure the long-term health and performance of your application, we offer the following post-launch support packages. These are optional and can be contracted separately.

  • Standard Package ($30,000/year):

    • 24/7 monitoring for critical downtime.
    • Support for latest OS versions (iOS/Android).
    • Bug fixes and security patches.
    • Monthly performance reports.
    • SLA: 4-hour response time for critical issues (P1).

  • Premium Package ($50,000/year):

    • Everything in Standard, plus:
    • Up to 160 hours of development for minor enhancements and new features.
    • Proactive performance optimization.
    • SLA: 1-hour response time for critical issues (P1).

9. Terms & Conditions

  • Contract Duration: The project contract is valid from the date of signing until the final deliverable is accepted and the final payment is made.
  • Intellectual Property Rights: All intellectual property, including source code, design assets, and documentation, will be transferred to the client upon full and final payment of the project invoice.
  • Confidentiality: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information shared during the course of the project. A formal Mutual NDA will be part of the contract.
  • Termination Clauses: Either party may terminate the agreement with 30 days' written notice. In such an event, the client will be responsible for payment for all work completed up to the termination date.

10. Next Steps

We are confident that AICOE is the ideal partner to bring the "Fitness Tracking App" to life. We are ready to begin as soon as you are.

  • Proposal Validity Period: This proposal is valid for 30 days from the date of issue.
  • Acceptance Process: To proceed, please sign and return a copy of this proposal. A formal contract will then be drafted for mutual review and signature.
  • Project Kickoff Timeline: The project can officially commence within one week of the signed contract.

We look forward to partnering with you to build a market-leading fitness application.

AICOE - Transforming Ideas into Intelligent Solutions

AICOE

© 2025 AICOE - AI Center of Excellence

This proposal is confidential and proprietary to AICOE

System Components

Detailed breakdown of all system components and their technologies

ComponentTypeTechnologyDescription
Mobile Application React Native App React Native, Redux, SQLite Cross-platform mobile app for iOS and Android with offline-first capabilities
API Gateway Gateway Service AWS API Gateway / Kong Central entry point for all API requests with authentication and rate limiting
Workout Service Microservice Node.js / Express.js Handles workout logging, exercise database, and workout plan management
Nutrition Service Microservice Python / FastAPI Manages nutrition logging with AI-powered food recognition
ML Service AI/ML Service TensorFlow, SageMaker, Python Machine learning service for personalization and computer vision
User Service Microservice Spring Boot / Java Manages user profiles, authentication, and preferences
Achievement Service Microservice Node.js Gamification engine for badges, streaks, and achievements
Plan Service Microservice Node.js Manages workout plans and scheduling

External Integrations

Third-party services and APIs integrated into the system

  • Apple HealthKit (Native SDK Integration): Sync health and workout data from Apple ecosystem
  • Google Fit (REST API Integration): Aggregate health data from Android devices and Google services
  • Wearable Devices (Bluetooth/Web API): Connect with Fitbit, Garmin, and other fitness trackers
  • Spotify API (OAuth 2.0 API): Integrate workout playlists and music control
  • Calendar APIs (REST API): Schedule workouts and send reminders
  • Google Vision API (Cloud AI Service): Food recognition for nutrition logging
  • Payment Gateway (Payment API): Handle premium subscriptions and in-app purchases

Infrastructure Overview

Hosting and infrastructure details

Hosting: AWS (EKS, Lambda, EC2)

Database: PostgreSQL (RDS), Redis (ElastiCache), DynamoDB

Caching: Redis Cluster, CloudFront CDN

CDN: AWS CloudFront with WAF
